text: Anata gata no naka, onkei o atae rare fuyu de noryoku arumononiha, sono kinshin ya, hinja to arra no michi no tame iju shita-sha-tachi no tame ni kisha shinai to, chikawa sete wa naranai. Kare-ra o yurushi ome ni mite yaru ga i. Arra ga anata gata o yurusa reru koto o nozomanai no ka. Hontoni arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
